scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p _site && [ -f src/robots.txt ] && cp src/robots.txt _site/ || true && [ -f src/ads.txt ] && cp src/ads.txt _site/ || true && [ -f src/humans.txt ] && cp src/humans.txt _site/ || true && [ -d src/.well-known ] && mkdir -p _site/.well-known && cp -R src/.well-known/. _site/.well-known/ || true && [ -f _headers ] && cp _headers _site/_headers || true
